chat.headbrowser.skin-equip: Successfully equip %s as a skin! Relog to apply.
chat.headbrowser.skin-fail: Failed to change skin. You are likely on a cracked account, or not connected to the internet.
tooltip.headbrowser.head-options:
Left Click - Equip head as skin
Right click - Add head to favourites
Middle Click - Get head (Creative only)
